original_text: Egypt's soldiers are as many as the trees in a great forest. But the enemy's soldiers will cut them down. Their army is like a hungry crowd of locusts. They are too many to count. Egypt's soldiers are as many as the trees in a great forest. But the enemy's soldiers will cut them down. Their army is like a hungry crowd of locusts. They are too many to count. Egypt's soldiers are as many as the trees in a great forest. But the enemy's soldiers will cut them down. Their army is like a hungry crowd of locusts. They are too many to count. Egypt's soldiers are as many as the trees in a great forest.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 그들이 황충보다 많아서 셀 수 없으므로 조사할 수 없는 그의 수풀을 찍을 것이라

sentences.original_text: Egypt's soldiers are as many as the trees
But the enemy's soldiers will cut them down
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 원수의 군사들이 그들을 베어버릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Their army is like a hungry crowd of locusts
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 군대는 배고픈 메뚜기 떼와 같습니다

sentences.original_text: They are too many to count
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너무 많아서 셀 수 없습니다
